author: GDS
contents: Hydrogeology often greatly impact geotechnical engineering and the visualisation of relationship between water level and extraction rate can benefit engineers to comprehend the hydrogeology characteristics.
title: Water level and Extraction relationship

author: GDS
contents: Tornado chart is effective method to visualise the impact of uncertainties.
title: Sensitivity analysis tool

author: GDS
contents: Often Geotechnical Engineer use televiewer data to calculate probability of failure (POF) and runout distance from the potential failure.
title: Probability of Failure and runout
